name: Chtonic Cycle II
description:
Eli Joteva
Chtonic Cycle II, 2021	
3D scanned point cloud data of grapes weightlessly grows into a moving light painting  
MP4	
1280 x 1280, 20 secs

Inspired by fermentation cycles in wine-making, the project "Chtonic Light" transforms decaying matter into digital light. In each NFT of this series, 3D scans of grapes decompose and regrow digitally. What new light/life forms can our contemporary tools birth? By @joteva

Chtonic Light premieres in 2022. WIP excerpts are presented in the second AlterHEN exhibition (alterhen.art).
